Name: Especial Day
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
22.5 ml Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur
3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: MUDDLE blackberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Rum-laced, very fruity, and toned by vermouth and generous dashed of bitters. If you like a French Martini you'll also like this.
History: Created in 2005 by Tonin Kacaj at Maze in London, England.
